boardgame.name: XenoShyft: Onslaught
boardgame.description: In XenoShyft: Onslaught, a strategic base defense deck-builder, players take on the role of the NorTec Military, charged with defending their base against the onslaught of the alien _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Hive_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;XenoShyft: Onslaught combines classic deck-building and resource management with fast-paced combat and unique _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;base defense_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; elements. As the game progresses, each player builds up their deck of Troop, Equipment, and Item cards, which they will in turn use to defend the base against incoming enemies in deadly combat._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;It is up to the players to work together in order to outlast the horrors awaiting them by coordinating strategy, utilizing the strengths of their unique divisions (Med Bay, Weapons Research, Science Lab, and Armory), and organizing defense tactics to ensure no player is caught off-guard by surprise attacks._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;XenoShyft: Onslaught is a game of tactical decisions and survival horror _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; and survival is never guaranteed._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: NorTec Commander Kickstarter Pledge with all bonuses. Please see https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/coolminiornot/xenoshyft-onslaught for more details on the Kickstarter Pledge. Shipping _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Handling: $15.00 Please note that this game is a pre-order and I haven_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t received it yet. Once I receive it, I will ship it to you.

I have two copies shipping to me (one was a surprise birthday present last year after I had already kickstarted it) and I am selling one. I have the NorTec Commander! - XenoShyft Onslaught core game (MSRP $59.99) + 4 folding lane boards (MSRP $15) + Kickstarter exclusive Ajax First Player Token + all applicable stretch goals. The stretch goals are listed here: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/coolminiornot/xenoshyft-onslaught/description Please note: The games are shipping now from the manufacturer so I should have this copy in my hands by April 9.
Reserved for Rob Nickles Includes Castle panic and expansion

I have in hand my copy of the NorTec Commander Kickstarter Pledge. This will also come with the added Psychogenics Research Expansion and Grafting Laboratory Expansion. When I opened the box, the mini that came with the kickstarter was in a plastic blister pack that was cut down the middle. The mini is fine, but the plastic blister is cut. Buyer to pay shipping costs.

Still shrink wrapped Kickstarter NorTec Commander Pledge including all the glorious KS goodies: 0. XenoShyft Onslaught Base Game 1. Ajax First player token ( incl. base, but has to be assembled ) 2. 4 folding player lanes 3. KS exclusive Hero Cards 4. KS exclusive experiment items booster packs 1 , 2 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; 3 5. Only played 2 times, Xenoshyft is a 2014 kickstarted co-op deck builder for 1-4 people. Game has nearly all kickstarter cards included (no sleeves) and is in mint condition. Selling due to needing funds. Contact for any info, picture can be provided :)

This game has been played twice, both times the cards were sleeved. This is the Kickstarter edition and comes with all stretch goals (playmat, Kickstarter cards, foil cards, player lanes, Ajax first player token, extra division cards, plastic tokens, spin down life counter), the Grafting Labratory expansion, the Psychogenics Research expansion, and R.O.D. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Ravage or Detonate_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; promo card (featuring Watch It Played_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Rodney Smith). For an extra $20 I will sleeve everything in Fantasy Flight Sleeves.

Kickstarter edition-- Nortec Commander Tier. New in shrink. Comes with all KS stretch rewards and cards, in shrink. That includes the neoprene playmat, foldable player lanes, and the Ajax mini (which is one of the worst minis I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve ever seen and you have to put together yourself) Also comes with Grafting Laboratory and Psychogenics Research expansions. Both card packs in shrink. Finally, comes with 6 player add-on pack, which lets you play up to six players obviously. READY to ship. I live in Ohio so shipping will be cheapest in the Midwest, Atlantic, and Southern states, while a little more expensive in the mountain and pacific states. Southern Florida, Texas and a few northeast states may be a little more expensive also. Send me a geekmail and I will let you know how much shipping is.
Ks edition with all stretch goals un open comes with both expansions .as well .Shipping 20.00 will refund the difference !

Played once, excellent condition kickstarter edition. Includes playmat and all stretch goals. Also includes Grafting Laboratory Expansion, Psychogenics Research Expansion, and 6th player add on. Free shipping when you buy any three games from me.

Auction reserve for XpresoAdct.

I sell my kickstarter version of Xenoshyft, shipped directly from CMON! It even includes 2 expansions, not usually part of all kickstarter versions as well: grafting-laboratory-expansion psychogenics-research-expansion The reason i do this is because i didnt know i had been asked to add shipping costs to the pledge. They send me one email with the pledge manager (when i already completed the survey) and it went into my spam folder and CMON didnt inform me anytime later that i need to finalze my pledge. Now i am asked to pay nearly 50$ shipping to germany and VAT (about 30$). Shipping to US is only about 9$. So i sell my pledge and i am pretty annoyed by CMON. Couldnt they send out a small reminder? And i am by far not the only one with that problem, search bgg forums.

Kickstarter edition-- Nortec Commander Tier. Punched but unplayed. Comes with all KS stretch rewards and bonus cards. Card Checklist: Core Game: 5x Each Item (24 Item Types Total) 1x Each Item Tracker (24 Types Total) 9x Each Non-Militia Troop (7 Types Total) 20x Militia 36x 1-Xenosathem 24x 3-Xenosathem 18x 6-Xenosathem 4x Each Non-Boss Enemy (27 Types Total) 1x Each Boss Enemy (6 Types Total) 1x Each Division (6 Types Total) 425 Cards Total Kickstarter Card Pack: 9x Field Commander 9x Scout Sniper 9x Erebus Stealth Suit 9x Tesla Volt Crasher Arc-Suit 4x Gore Mosquito 4x Deathmaw 4x Grave Titan Tarantula 48 Cards Total (+1 Rules Card and +1 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Cover Card_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;) Kickstarter Foil Card Pack: 24x Foil Items (1 copy Each) 6x Full-Art Core Game Boss Enemies (1 Copy Each) 3x Onslaught Full-Art Boss Enemies (1 Copy Each) 8x NorTec Heroes (1 Copy Each) 41 Cards Total (+1 Rules Card and +1 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Cover Card_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;) Grafting Lab Expansion 5x Each Item (6 Types Total) 1x Each Item Tracker (6 Total) 1x Division (1 Total) 37 Cards Total (+1 Rules Card and +1 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Cover Card_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;) Psychogenics Lab Expansion 5x Each Item (6 Types Total) 1x Each Item Tracker (6 Total) 1x Division (1 Total) 37 Cards Total (+1 Rules Card and +1 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Cover Card_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;)

This ist the NorTec Commander Kickstarter edition of XenoShyft, with extras components: - every stretch goal (see kickstarter website for details: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/coolminiornot/xenoshyft-onslaught/description - Xenoshyft Sleeves - 4 folding lane boards - Kickstarter exclusive Ajax First Player Token - Defender Miniature - Grafting Lab Expansion - Psychogenics Research Expansion - XenoShyft Onslaught Source Book - XenoShyft Dog Tags You get the game in a Sleeved Card Game Organizer from the broken token (http://www.thebrokentoken.com/sleeved-card-game-organizer/), because I got ride of the ugly plastic one. Also the cheap paper player mate and the lane boards are not in the box, because I got the play-mat, and the folding lane boards as seen in the pictures. If you want to now more details or ask for shippin methodes, just write me a message!

Shipping from 84062 - I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll use whatever shipping method you prefer or USPS if you don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t have a preference.

This is the KS edition that has all the extras including the Xenoshyft Sleeves. It has been sleeved and organized, and I even made an organizer for easier set up and play. Although this has been opened and set up, it has never been played. I have played my friends copy several times and he has the same edition, but has the extra 5-6 player boards that I dont have. If you purchased this, it is ready to be played and has everything but the 5-6 player board (which I wouldnt recommend). Photos will hopefully show you the organizer, since the game is scattered otherwise. Great game, great fun, and a thinker. Not always easy to win so if you like a challenge this is a good one.

One corner of the box cover is split. All components present and accounted for. Kickstarter Edition Includes Grafting expansion Psychogenics expansion Kickstarter card pack (foils) R.O.D. Promo card hero Buyer pays actual shipping.
UK Shipping = £3 I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m happy to combine orders to save on shipping. Will only ship within the UK

Never played (opened to verify content), perfect condition, Kickstarter Edition, with the Grafting lab and Psychogenics expansions. Also comes with 4 folding game board quality player boards, a neoprene rubber center playmat, an unopened Ajax Miniature, plus all Kickstarter stretch goals and exclusive cards. Far superior to the retail components (which are also included). These components are nice enough that I suggest getting a KS copy over retail anyway that you can, even if it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s not mine! I Prefer local cash payment pickups, but I am more than happy to ship. Buyer would be responsible for shipping. By default I typically mail at the cheapest rate which includes insurance and tracking, but as long as these are included, I will ship anyway requested. I may also consider a cash + trade offer, but the likelihood is low since I would rather sell. If you have questions, please geekmail me. Please only serious offers, my price is pretty firm. Thanks!

I absolutely love this game, but find myself playing it on tablet more these days. The game has been played only twice and everything is in really good condition, except the game box that is dented from one corner (happened during original transport). This is a great game and I cannot recommend it enough! This listing is not for the item listed only, but the whole set, which includes: + XenoShyft Onslaught (Kickstarter Base Set) + Kickstarter Exclusive Cards + Kickstarter Exclusive Foil Hero Cards + Kickstarter Exclusive Foil Prototype Cards + Kickstarter Exclusive Foil Boss Cards + Heavy Cardboard Folding Player Lanes + Grafting Laboratory (Mini-Expansion) + Psychogenics Research (Mini-Expansion) + 5-6 Player Expansion (Mini-Expansion) + R.O.D. Heroic Paratrooper (Very Rare Promo Card) Basically the set includes EVERYTHING that is gameplay related that was released during the Kickstarter campaign + the very rare R.O.D. Heroic Paratrooper card from WatchItPlayed. Note that it doesn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t include the Nortec Commander miniature that was broken and missing parts in most copies that was shipped. I threw that away as it was the cheapest and worst quality miniature I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve seen from CoolMiniOrNot. This set does not include Hive expansion that was released recently. Every card in the game is sleeved, but not using the Kickstarter sleeves (which were in bad quality). Instead the sleeves used are premium sleeves from Arcane Tinmen. All components are fit in the main box (without the insert) and organized in logical plastic bags. Please note that this is a heavy box and I will be able to provide you shipping quote once you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve made the initial order. Please let me know the country, I am willing to ship worldwide and always ship with a tracking number.

This is the NorTec Commander Kickstarter edition, and is new in shrink and never been played. Includes the player mat, bonus unit model, extra cards and player boards, all sealed and unused, along with all the stretch goals from the KS campaign. From a private, non-smoking collection.

This is the Kickstarter version of the game. It includes the following card packs: Grafting Lab Expansion, Psychogenics Lab Expansion, Kickstarter Card Pack and Kickstarter Foil Card Pack. It has only been played a few times. All components are in baggies. Free shipping to the US.

Cool Mini Or Not (CMNXS0001) _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;It started out like any other job. Hit the planet, rip the rocks, go home and get paid. But this time we dug too deep, woke something up, and now, we_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re just trying to survive long enough to get out of these beasts_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; hive..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; In XenoShyft Onslaught, players take on the role of a commander in the NorTec Corporation. You_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re tasked with defending your division of the NorTec base as wave after wave of horrific aliens attempt to destroy the base and end NorTec_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s strip mining operation. While XenoShyft Onslaught has deck-building elements, it is not your average deck-building game. Instead XenoShyft plays like a popular tower defense game found on mobile devices. Using a wide array of troops, weapons, armors, and technology cards, players must last 9 rounds as the alien hordes bombard the NorTec base in increasingly difficult waves. Working together to fight the onslaught of beasts and creatures from the depths will take everything you have in your arsenal otherwise you and your fellow soldiers will not survive.
Played once.
